overview:
Mike Golebiowski, President of IBT, has been involved in outsource services and technology innovation in the financial industry for the last 39 years. He started out as a programmer/analyst and quickly moved to management roles for a number of key banks and service companies. He managed development projects for Financial Technology, EDS and The Lane Banking Group before founding MICR Resource Management.

Mike served as CEO of MICR Resource Management, a company providing outsourse services for the banking industry, for 27 years, until he merged this company with Integrated Bank Technology in 2008. In addition, Mike also serves on a ECCHO sub-committe on electronic exchange issues and on the Board of Trustees of MacCormac college in Chicago.
